item.title: The X200 Pro extends generational imaging excellence: Vivo’s Vikas Tagra - Hindustan Times
item.description:
The X200 Pro extends generational imaging excellence: Vivo’s Vikas Tagra

Publication Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Vivo X200 Pro is setting new benchmarks in smartphone photography with significant upgrades over its predecessor, the X100 Pro.

  • The new model features a 200-megapixel telephoto camera, a solid-state 6000mAh battery, and an overhauled Funtouch OS 15.
  • Vivo introduces advancements in camera technology that enhance low light performance and detail accuracy.
  • The phone is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9400 with 16GB RAM and 512GB storage, priced at ₹94,999.
“AI will obviously keep improving. That is one differentiator we must have,” says Vikas Tagra.

The X200 Pro aims to provide a comprehensive flagship photography experience, setting high expectations for competitors while introducing advanced AI features focused on utility.

item.title: Apple Announces Best iPhone Apps And Games of 2024: Full List Here - News18
item.description:
Apple Announces Best iPhone Apps And Games of 2024: Full List Here

Date: December 16, 2024
Source: News18

Apple has unveiled the winners of the 2024 App Store Awards, highlighting exceptional apps and games across various categories recognized for their design and innovation.

  • iPhone App of the Year: Kino (LUX Optics Inc.) - A video camera app with film features.
  • iPad App of the Year: Moises (Moises Systems Inc.) - An AI app for musicians with audio features.
  • Mac App of the Year: Adobe Lightroom (Adobe Inc.) - A photo editing tool with effective search capabilities.
  • Apple Vision Pro App of the Year: What If…? – An Immersive Story (Disney) - A storytelling app with graphical experiences.
  • Apple Watch App of the Year: Lumy (Raja V) - A sun exposure tracking app.
  • Apple TV App of the Year: F1 TV (Formula One Digital Media Limited) - Offers live races and highlights for F1 fans.
  • iPhone Game of the Year: AFK Journey (Farlight Games) - A tactical adventure game.
  • iPad Game of the Year: Squad Busters (Supercell) - A multiplayer logistical strategy game.
  • Mac Game of the Year: Thank Goodness You’re Here! (Panic, Inc.) - An absurd adventure game.
  • Apple Vision Pro Game of the Year: THRASHER: Arcade Odyssey (Puddle, LLC) - An engaging arcade game.
  • Apple Arcade Game of the Year: Balatro+ (Playstack Ltd.) - A strategic card game.

Cultural Impact Winners: Oko, EF Hello, Daily Art, NYT Games, The Wreck, Do You Really Want To Know? 2.

item.title: Samsung and Google team up for Gemini AI-powered XR headset - The Hindu
item.description:
Samsung and Google Collaborate on Gemini AI-Powered XR Headset

Published: December 16, 2024 12:09 pm IST | Source: The Hindu

Samsung recently revealed their collaboration with Google on an XR headset, named Project Moohan. The headset integrates Google’s Gemini AI assistant, expanding on the AI’s multimodal features.

  • The device responds to the command “Hey Gemini” for activation, unlike the usual “Hey Google.”
  • It incorporates advanced features such as gesture-controlled searching, virtual display for viewing media, live translation, and immersive Google Maps.
  • The headset is based on the Android XR interface.
  • Pricing details and launch specifics are yet to be announced, but it will be available next year.
  • Google is also collaborating with other firms like Magic Leap on similar XR products.
Samsung’s headset is expected to revolutionize how users interact with mixed reality through AI.

This collaboration aims to enhance user experiences with XR technologies and AI integration, marking a significant step in the evolution of immersive tech.

item.title: Exclusive: Industry leaders on tackling Ad Fatigue with Creativity, Data and Innovation - Mediabrief
item.description:
Exclusive: Industry leaders on tackling Ad Fatigue with Creativity, Data and Innovation

Publication Date: December 3, 2024

Source: MediaBrief

In a MediaBrief exclusive, industry leaders share their perspectives on the challenge of ad fatigue in today's advertising landscape, highlighting the importance of creativity, data, and innovative approaches to keep consumers engaged.

  • Balancing brand consistency with creativity is crucial.
  • Storytelling is emphasized as a key approach in ad campaigns.
  • Utilizing data-driven insights can help prevent ad fatigue.
  • Personalization and audience segmentation are vital strategies.
  • Innovative technologies like AI and interactive ads enhance engagement.
“Emotional resonance is vital for building a lasting connection between consumers and brands.” - Prerana Singh

This discussion serves as a guide for brands aiming to evolve their advertising strategies, ensuring relevance and maintaining consumer interest amidst a saturated market.

item.description:
Mukul Agrawal picks stake in multibagger stock that’s up 400% in a year

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: Live Mint

Today's edition of Stocks Made Easy shines a spotlight on a luxury car rental services company that has shown remarkable performance in the stock market.

  • Mukul Agrawal has made a significant investment in a stock that has appreciated by 400% over the past year.
  • The article discusses the trends around luxury car rental services and the related stock performance.

item.title: OpenAI announces ChatGPT Projects to organise group tasks - The Hindu
item.description:
OpenAI Launches 'Projects' Feature for ChatGPT Users

Publication Date: December 16, 2024 Source: The Hindu

OpenAI has unveiled a new feature called 'Projects' for ChatGPT, enabling users to organize group tasks more effectively during its '12 Days of Shipmas' releases.

  • The Projects feature allows users to customize how ChatGPT reacts to requests related to group tasks.
  • Users can create projects by clicking on the '+' button next to the Projects icon.
  • Project icons can be personalized with different colors and titles.
  • Utilizes the GPT-4o model for enhanced performance.
  • Demonstrated features include assigning Secret Santa tasks and website creation with editable templates.
  • Available for ChatGPT Plus, Pro, and Teams, with early access for Enterprise and Edu users in the new year.
OpenAI researchers demonstrated functionality like random task assignments and reminders for household chores.

The introduction of 'Projects' indicates OpenAI's continued expansion of ChatGPT capabilities, focusing on practical applications for users.

item.title: OnePlus 13 India Launch Next Month and Here Are 5 Upgrades You Should Expect - Times Now
item.description:
OnePlus 13 India Launch Next Month and Here Are 5 Upgrades You Should Expect

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: Times Now Tech

OnePlus is set to launch its flagship smartphone series next month, featuring two models: the OnePlus 13 and the OnePlus 13R. Significant upgrades are expected, including a powerful Snapdragon chip, an improved camera system, and better battery performance.

  • Improved performance with Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • New design featuring a Vegan leather finish and potential IP69 rating.
  • Flat display design with high refresh-rate LTPO panel.
  • Enhanced camera capabilities with upgraded sensors.
  • Increased battery capacity to 6000mAh with 100W charging support.
“We have seen about a 40 pct increase in the CPU performance, along with enhanced GPU and AI performance on the Snapdragon 8 Elite-powered phones.”

The OnePlus 13 launch date in India will be announced soon, as the anticipation builds around the latest offerings from OnePlus.

item.title: Apple is working on a foldable iPhone and iPad: Report - NewsBytes
item.description:
Apple is Working on Foldable iPhone and iPad, Report Reveals

Publication Date: Not specified Source: NewsBytes

Apple is reportedly developing two foldable devices, including a large 19-inch device aimed at competing with desktop monitors and a smaller foldable iPhone with a larger screen than the iPhone 16 Pro Max.

  • Apple is focusing on a foldable iPad with a main design effort.
  • The foldable iPhone is expected to launch around 2026, while the iPad could follow by 2028.
  • Challenges persist with the hinge and display cover technology before the devices can be released.
“Apple is also exploring a foldable iPhone, with progress on screens that avoid the visible crease seen in current models.”

In conclusion, while Apple is advancing in foldable technology, it faces challenges that may delay the rollout of these innovative devices.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air Price Leaked Ahead Of 2025 Launch, May Cost Around Rs 90,000 In India: All We Know So Far - Times Now
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air Price Leaked Ahead Of 2025 Launch, May Cost Around Rs 90,000 In India: All We Know So Far

Publication Date: Not specified

Source: Times Now

Leaks around Apple’s next-generation iPhone 17 series are surfacing. The iPhone 17 Air is expected to launch alongside its counterparts in September 2035, priced around Rs 90,000 in India.

  • The iPhone 17 series will include four models: iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max.
  • The iPhone 17 Air is rumored to be thinner than existing models, at approximately 5mm to 6mm thick.
  • It may feature a 6.6-inch display and a single rear camera.
  • Apple is said to be using its own custom-designed 5G modem chip for the device.
  • Apple plans to release two foldable devices in the future, including a foldable iPhone.
“The thinnest iPhone so far was the iPhone 6, which was 6.9mm thick.”

In conclusion, the iPhone 17 Air is set to introduce noteworthy design changes and competitive pricing, marking another step forward in Apple's smartphone evolution.

item.title: Oppo Find X8 Ultra Tipped to Come With 2K Display and 6,000mAh Battery; Other Key Specifications Leak - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Oppo Find X8 Ultra's Key Specifications Leak Ahead of Launch Next Year

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Gadgets 360

As the Oppo Find X8 series makes waves following its recent global launch, rumors emerge about the upcoming Find X8 Ultra model along with leaked specifications that suggest impressive features.

  • Expected to feature a 6.82-inch 2K display.
  • May include an ultrasonic fingerprint sensor embedded under the display.
  • Reported IP68+IP69 rating for superior dust and water resistance.
  • Speculated 6,000mAh battery with 80W or 90W fast charging support.
  • Camera system rumored to include four 50-megapixel sensors configured for different functionalities.
  • Expected to have a 120Hz refresh rate and powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
"The Oppo Find X8 Ultra is expected to arrive in Q1 2025 alongside the Oppo Find N5."

The Oppo Find X8 Ultra is generating significant anticipation as it introduces innovative technologies and high capabilities likely to enhance user experience once it launches.

item.title: Google, Samsung team up for mixed-reality headset and Android XR. to take on Apple's Vision Pro - Firstpost
item.description:
Google and Samsung Collaborate on Mixed-Reality Headset to Compete with Apple's Vision Pro

Date: December 12, 2024 Source: Firstpost

The tech world is buzzing as Google and Samsung unveiled their big bet on mixed reality with the Android XR platform and a brand-new headset dubbed Project Moohan. This collaboration aims to challenge Apple’s Vision Pro in the race to dominate the future of immersive technology.

  • Project Moohan is slated for a 2025 launch.
  • The headset integrates advanced features like eye tracking, hand tracking, and voice control.
  • It is powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon XR2 chip.
  • The Android XR platform focuses on a customizable interface and seamless integration with existing Google services.
  • Collaborators include Adobe, Calm, and Major League Baseball.
“With big-name collaborators like Adobe, Calm, and Major League Baseball already on board, the groundwork is being laid for a robust XR ecosystem.”

The collaboration between Google and Samsung has the potential to redefine digital interactions through mixed reality, though it remains to be seen if they can successfully compete with Apple's Vision Pro.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra To S25 Slim: Price In India, Launch Date, Design, Specs And Leaks - Times Now
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra To S25 Slim: Price In India, Launch Date, Design, Specs And Leaks

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Samsung's Galaxy S25 series, expected to launch in January 2025, will include the Galaxy S25, S25 Plus, S25 Ultra, and S25 Slim.

  • Expected launch date: January 22, 2025, during Galaxy Unpacked event.
  • Price in India: Galaxy S25 starting at Rs 75,000; S25 Plus at Rs 95,000; S25 Ultra at Rs 1,29,000; S25 Slim priced between Rs 65,000 and Rs 70,000.
  • All models are expected to feature Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset for AI-driven performance.
  • The S25 Ultra to be approximately 14 grams lighter with a sleeker design.
  • Galaxy S25 Slim aims to be compact yet powerful.
"Leaks suggest that the Galaxy S25 Slim will be Samsung's thinnest smartphone in the lineup."

The Galaxy S25 series is set to make a significant update to Samsung's flagship smartphone lineup, with notable specifications and designs enhancements anticipated.

item.title: False news of Luigi Mangione suicide attempt was generated by AI; BBC complains to Apple - The Hindu
item.description:
BBC Complains to Apple Over AI-Generated False News About Luigi Mangione

Published on December 16, 2024, by The Hindu

The BBC has raised concerns with Apple following an AI-generated news notification that inaccurately reported that Luigi Mangione attempted suicide. This misunderstanding has led to confusion and panic online.

  • The false news claimed that Mangione, accused of shooting UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, had tried to take his own life.
  • This incident is part of a broader issue where AI-generated misinformation has occurred, previously affecting platforms like Google's Gemini chatbot.
  • Widespread panic ensued from a screenshot circulating on social media that alleged “Luigi Mangione shoots himself.”
  • The BBC is in communication with Apple to resolve the issue, which they have yet to formally comment on.
“BBC News is the most trusted news media in the world. It is essential to us that our audiences can trust any information or journalism published in our name and that includes notifications,” said a BBC spokesperson.

This incident highlights ongoing frustrations among Americans regarding health insurance, brought to the forefront by the violent events involving Mangione.

item.title: False news of Luigi Mangione suicide was generated by AI; BBC complains to Apple - The Hindu
item.description:
False news of Luigi Mangione suicide was generated by AI; BBC complains to Apple

Date: December 16, 2024
Source: The Hindu

The BBC has lodged a complaint with Apple regarding a false notification generated by AI, which claimed that Luigi Mangione had attempted suicide. This misleading information emerged amidst the ongoing coverage of the UnitedHealthcare CEO shooting incident attributed to Mangione.

  • AI-generated news notification falsely reported Luigi Mangione's attempted suicide.
  • The notification caused panic and confusion online.
  • This incident has brought attention to the issue of misinformation from AI.
  • BBC is in discussions with Apple about the incident.
  • The UnitedHealthcare CEO was shot on December 4, 2024.
“BBC News is the most trusted news media in the world. It is essential to us that our audiences can trust any information or journalism published in our name.”

The incident raises concerns over the reliability of AI-generated content and its impact on public perception and trust in news sources.

item.title: Apple Developing Foldable iPhone, iPad: Report - Deccan Chronicle
item.description:
Apple Developing Foldable iPhone, iPad: Report

Publication Date: 2023

Source: The Wall Street Journal

Apple is reportedly working on two foldable devices, including a foldable iPhone and a larger device referred to as a foldable iPad, potentially set for launch in 2026 or 2027.

The devices are said to feature advanced technology to minimize visible creases on screens, with the iPhone boasting a display larger than the current iPhone 16 Pro Max.

  • Apple is developing a foldable iPhone with a screen size of at least 7 inches.
  • A foldable iPad may resemble two iPad Pros side-by-side.
  • The launch could face delays due to challenges with hinges and display covers.
“The foldable iPhone will hit the market first and could be launched in 2026 or a year later.”

This development highlights Apple’s commitment to innovation in device design, aiming to compete in the growing foldable market.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air to Be Priced Below Pro Models; Apple to Launch Foldable iPhone in 2026: Report - Gadgets 360
item.description:
A Foldable iPhone May Debut in 2026: Report

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Wall Street Journal

Apple is reportedly developing two foldable devices, including a foldable iPhone, aimed for a 2026 release, with plans to cut costs on the new iPhone 17 Air model.

  • The iPhone 17 Air is expected to be thinner and priced lower than the Pro models.
  • Apple is focusing on simplified camera features to keep costs down.
  • The iPhone 17 Air may feature a 48-megapixel single rear camera.
  • Two foldable devices are in development: a foldable iPhone and a foldable laptop replacement.
  • The foldable devices could face delays in release due to design challenges.
“Apple executives were planning a 2026 release for the foldable devices but might delay the launch by up to a year to address any potential challenges.”

This development reflects Apple's ongoing efforts to innovate in the smartphone market while addressing pricing and design complexities.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air rumoured to debut at a lower price than Pro models - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air Rumored to Launch at Competitive Price

Published On: Dec 16, 2024 | Source: The Wall Street Journal

The anticipated iPhone 17 Air is rumored to debut in 2025 at a price point similar to that of the iPhone 16 Plus, contradicting earlier speculations of it being a premium offering.

  • The iPhone 17 Air will reportedly feature a slim design, measuring around 5-6mm in thickness.
  • It aims to provide a more affordable option compared to the Pro models, featuring a simplified camera system.
  • The expected pricing is around $900 (approx. Rs 76,350) in the US and around Rs 89,900 in India.
  • It may incorporate high-end features like a 6.6-inch Super Retina XDR display, 48-megapixel primary camera, and a new A19 chip.
  • The launch is speculated to occur in September 2025.
“Apple is clearly placing a strong emphasis on the ultra-thin form factor as a key selling point for its visual appeal.”

This initiative signifies Apple's shift towards creating a competitive, affordable model while still attracting users with top-tier specifications.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Price Might Not Be That Bad In 2025: Know More - News18
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Price Might Not Be That Bad In 2025: Know More

Date: December 16, 2024

Source: News18

With the launch of the Galaxy S25 series expected next month, speculation around its pricing has emerged, hinting at no shock price increases in Europe.

  • The Galaxy S25 in Sweden is expected to remain at 11,490 kroner, the same as the S24.
  • Galaxy S25 Ultra might retail for 1449 euros in Germany, with the entry-level model priced at 899 euros.
  • Samsung is planning to provide significant upgrades in features and internal specs while keeping prices stable.
  • There could be a price increase in Asian and Middle Eastern markets due to rising manufacturing costs.
“Samsung’s price decision in Asia and the Middle East might not be that exciting, and the chances of the Galaxy S25 prices getting a hike is quite high.”

The Samsung Galaxy S25 series is anticipated to offer substantial enhancements at relatively stable prices, appealing to buyers after previous flagship releases.
